title: 분사 삽입구문
description: 분사를 활용한 삽입구문으로 문장에 생동감과 정보를 추가하는 방법을 연습합니다.
examples: The team, working tirelessly, completed the project on time.
The students, having studied hard, performed well on the exam.
The company, founded in 1990, has grown significantly.
learning_points: 분사 삽입구문을 통한 생동감 있는 정보 추가

sentences.kr: 팀은, 지칠 줄 모르고 일하며, 프로젝트를 제시간에 완료했습니다.
sentences.en: The team, working tirelessly, completed the project on time.

sentences.kr: 학생들은, 열심히 공부한 덕분에, 시험에서 좋은 성과를 거두었습니다.
sentences.en: The students, having studied hard, performed well on the exam.
The company, founded in 1990, has grown significantly.

sentences.kr: 관리자는, 신중하게 고려한 후, 최종 결정을 내렸습니다.
sentences.en: The manager, having considered carefully, made the final decision.

sentences.kr: 연구진은, 수년간 연구하며, 중요한 발견을 했습니다.
sentences.en: The researchers, working for years, made an important discovery.
The product, having been thoroughly tested, was launched in the market.

sentences.kr: 직원들은, 새로운 시스템에 적응하며, 생산성을 향상시켰습니다.
sentences.en: The employees, adapting to the new system, improved productivity.
The plan, having been reviewed by experts, was approved.
